featured.text: One former prime minister considered it important enough to reveal in his official profile that he was a type A, while his opposition rival was type B.
Why did Prime Minister Ryu Matsumoto resign from office?
In 2011, a minister, Ryu Matsumoto, was forced to resign after only a week in office, when a bad-tempered encounter with local officials was televised.

definition.zh_def: 部長；大臣，負責政府某一部門的官員。
definition.en_def: A member of the government in charge of a specific department.
definition.example: The minister announced new policies to improve education.
